content.content: I tried to use https://liquidations.makerdao.com again today during the recent market downturn and I had some success this time but I also encountered some more errors ): least of which the prices seemed to be lagging behind the prices on makerburn.com. When I hit the max button in the Dai field I got an odd error (image 1) implying I wasn’t trying to buy the entire lot(I had more than enough Dai to buy it). Also, I had difficulty withdrawing my unused Dai hitting the max button puts too much Dai in that field I had to reduce it by the slightest amount to make it work.
After attempting to participate in another debt auction wave the error in the image above appears to be another rounding error. Increasing DAI you pay by another 0.00000001 solves the error
Hey @Paperliss—are you on Discord by any chance? I might have identified the potential cause of the issue but I’d need to verify this. If possible please DM me on Discord: 0xdeniz#8083
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
